Main Menu

    • Settings() => Nulls, missing, incorrect, duplicates, fuzzy match

  • DescribeMenu() => FOL, AGG, OPS, Settings

  • CompareMenu() => Settings

  • LearnMenu() => StatisticalTesting -> Uni Multi Predict

  • Exit()
